name: Flower Forest
description:
You’re on a journey to find your stolen name deep in a forest. Plant flowers to complete rituals and open passageways. Maybe you can also use them to retrace your steps and find your way? Someone else is lurking in the shadows. Are they following you?

By Alex Basinki, Alexa Wilbert, Ardent Eliot :-) Reinhard, and Star Hagen-Esquerra
